name: web-scraper
description: The original project started as vanilla javascript, but I decided to use React to handle the state changes. The **_output_** route will make a GET request to the back-end `/api/v1/uploads/output.html` to get the scraped data. The back-end will then send the data to the front-end and the front-end will render the data in the browser.

scripts.build: npm install && npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"

author: Marco Vinicio
